Steps.title: Step 1
Steps.description: We replicate your house in 3D. One of our team members will visit the site to shoot a video of your home.

Steps.title: Step 2
Steps.description: Our team of highly talented designers will design your home personalised just for you!

Steps.title: Step 3
Steps.description: Unlock a room for free so you can experience our designs before subscribing to the entire payment plan! Once you're satisfied, your home will be ready in less than 45 days*!

Steps.title: Step 4
Steps.description: Get started on your home interiors with Larcel by filling the form and our designers will get in touch with you in no time!
